parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account. You do not need to specify this parameter because this parameter will be removed in the future.

parameters.name: ConsumerGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the consumer group. The name cannot exceed 128 characters in length. We recommend that you use an informative name for easy identification.

parameters.name: ConsumerGroupPassword
parameters.description:
The password that corresponds to the username of the consumer group.

*   A password must contain two or more of the following characters: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and special characters.
*   A password must be 8 to 32 characters in length.

parameters.name: ConsumerGroupUserName
parameters.description:
The username of the consumer group.

*   A username must contain one or more of the following characters: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and underscores (\_).
*   A username cannot exceed 16 characters in length.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the change tracking instance resides. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).

parameters.name: SubscriptionInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the change tracking instance. You can call the DescribeSubscriptionInstances operation to query the instance ID.
